name: Master Shapeshifter
description:
Your Guardian, Balance or Feral Affinity is amplified granting an additional effect.

Guardian Affinity
Chance to be critically hit by melee attacks reduced by 10% while in Bear Form.

 Balance Affinity
After you enter Moonkin Form, the cast time of your Wrath and Starfire is reduced by 30% and their damage is increased by 20% for 10 sec.

 Feral Affinity
While in Cat Form, your bleed damage is increased by 30%.
